Enchantment 6

Forest Dome
Ritual
N5
spell id [id]: 956
effect number [effect_number]: 84
damage [damage]: 66
spec [spec]: 8388608
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 10N
Local Enchant Province - Permanent Duration:Forest Dome
Dispelled if province changes owners :1
Hidden Enchantment :1
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
Vegetation will grow into a dome that covers the entire province where the spell is cast. The dome will protect the province from many spells that originate outside the warded province. If left undisturbed, the forest dome will last forever. However, if a Fire spell is absorbed by the dome, it may catch fire and be destroyed. If the caster dies, the dome will wither and die.
Dome Protection 30%. Destroyed by Fire Spells. Friendly spells will also be blocked.
